analysis.description:
Reentrancy in IRBPreCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#703-716):
	External calls:
	- vault.close() (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#712)
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#714)
	- token.endPreTokensale() (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#714-715)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#715-716)

IRBPreCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#728-730) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-vault.withdraw(amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol)

IRBPreCrowdsale.endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#569-571)
IRBPreCrowdsale.startTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#562-564)
IRBToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0x269b4c23ddab676e2869ae72cd6ae4f24bdfea45.sol#287)
